# Aurora DSQL Documentation

> Documentation for Amazon Aurora DSQL, a serverless distributed SQL database

Documentation for Amazon Aurora DSQL, a serverless distributed SQL database

## Overview

- [Welcome](https://awslabs.github.io/aurora-dsql-starter-kit/index.md): Welcome
- [What is Amazon Aurora DSQL?](https://awslabs.github.io/aurora-dsql-starter-kit/what-is-amazon-aurora-dsql.md): What is Amazon Aurora DSQL?

## Getting Started

- [Getting Started](https://awslabs.github.io/aurora-dsql-starter-kit/guides/getting-started/quickstart.md): Getting Started

- [Managing Clusters Overview](https://awslabs.github.io/aurora-dsql-starter-kit/managing-clusters.md): Managing Clusters Overview
